author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Carefully break the eggs into the pan and fry for 2-3 minutes, or until cooked to your liking. Place the warm chapattis onto a plate and place the fried eggs on top.  To serve, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper and sprinkle over the chilli flakes and parsley.
ingredients: 2 tbsp vegetable oil,  2 free-range eggs,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  Â½ tsp dried chilli flakes,  1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley ,  2 hot chapattis
